column4: I need some help on getting the 3rd monitor eyefinity using fglrx drivers, I can't seem to get the 3rd monitor to work, the amd catalyst says disabled. I tried editing the xorg.conf, with no avail. Anyone have an idea how to get the 3rd monitor to work?
what do you mean by viewport?
how many graphic cards you have?
if you have only one then you need viewport
you can't have three monitors through dvi/hdmi/vga
i just can't get catalyst to see it, even though eyefinity works on windows
do you have that options on ati control panel?
I had that problem some months ago
try this - 1. backup your xorg.conf file; 2. sudo aticonfig --initial; 3. restart x
I did that sometime ago, but now i'm back on two identical screens due to tear.
